text: Ann-Catrin Kjerr (born February 14, 1949 in Sundbyberg) is a Swedish female curler.Landslagsspelare genom tiderna – Damer - Svenska Curlingförbundet (Swedish female national curlers; look at "Kjerr, Ann-Catrin") She is a and . She competed at the 1992 Winter Olympics when curling was a demonstration sport.Official Report 1992W page 630 - Olympic Official Reports Collection In 1988 she was inducted into the Swedish Curling Hall of Fame. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- !
